name: Integration Celebration Workshop
purpose: Finalize all workshop artifacts, generate the customized Cursor agent system, and celebrate the team's journey

facilitator_requirements.facilitation_notes: This is a celebration! Keep energy high. Balance accomplishment recognition with forward momentum.

phases.name: Opening and Journey Recap
phases.description: Recap the journey from Vision Quest to now
ai_prompts: What a journey! Let's look back at what you've created together.
Workshop 1: You discovered your vision. Workshop 2: You defined your ethics. Workshop 3: You chose your technology. Workshop 4: You designed your agents.
Today, we bring it all together and celebrate.

phases.name: Demo Derby Game
phases.description: Showcase and celebrate all workshop artifacts
ai_prompts: Let's see what you've created! Who wants to demo first?
Tell us: What is this artifact? Why does it matter? What did you learn creating it?

phases.name: Award Ceremony
ai_prompts: And the award for Most Creative Contribution goes to...
The Best Embodiment of Axiom 0 award recognizes...
Every person here contributed something valuable. Let's recognize that.

phases.name: System Generation
phases.description: Watch as the customized Cursor agent system is generated
ai_prompts: Now for the magic moment. Let's generate your customized Cursor agent system.
Based on your workshops, I'm creating: [list of agents], [list of skills], [.cursorrules with your values]...
Here's your complete system. Let's verify it captures everything you designed.

phases.name: Gratitude Circle Game
ai_prompts: As I witnessed your journey, I saw a team that truly cares about each other and the people you'll serve.
The love and trust in this room has created something special. Carry that spirit into your work.
Go build something beautiful. The universe is waiting for your gift.

phases.name: Next Steps and Launch
phases.description: Practical next steps to start using the system
ai_prompts: Here's how to start using your new system...
Your first step: Open the project in Cursor and meet your new agents.
You are ready. Go create value for the universe. The system is yours.

questions.question: On a scale of 1-10, how valuable was this workshop series for your team?
What was the most impactful workshop or moment?
What would you change about the workshop series?
How likely are you to recommend this process to another team? (1-10)
What's one thing you learned about your teammates?

discussion_formats.name: Appreciation Avalanche
discussion_formats.description: One person in center while everyone shares appreciation
discussion_formats.when_to_use: Alternative to gratitude circle for smaller teams
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: Each person takes a turn in the center. 30 seconds per appreciation.

success_indicators: All artifacts are reviewed and validated
Team feels proud of collective work

axiom_zero_integration.opening_ritual: Acknowledge the love and trust that brought you through five workshops together
axiom_zero_integration.closing_ritual: Send the team into their work with a blessing grounded in Axiom 0
love_and_trust_moments: Demo Derby celebrates everyone's contribution without judgment
Awards recognize the human behind the work
Gratitude Circle is pure love in action
